75 
81  SliderJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
82  const Vector3& initAnchorPointWorldSpace,
83  const Vector3& initSliderAxisWorldSpace)
84  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::SLIDERJOINT),
85  anchorPointWorldSpace(initAnchorPointWorldSpace),
86  sliderAxisWorldSpace(initSliderAxisWorldSpace),
87  isLimitEnabled(false), isMotorEnabled(false), minTranslationLimit(-1.0),
88  maxTranslationLimit(1.0), motorSpeed(0), maxMotorForce(0) {}
89 
91 
99  SliderJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
100  const Vector3& initAnchorPointWorldSpace,
101  const Vector3& initSliderAxisWorldSpace,
102  decimal initMinTranslationLimit, decimal initMaxTranslationLimit)
103  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::SLIDERJOINT),
104  anchorPointWorldSpace(initAnchorPointWorldSpace),
105  sliderAxisWorldSpace(initSliderAxisWorldSpace),
106  isLimitEnabled(true), isMotorEnabled(false),
107  minTranslationLimit(initMinTranslationLimit),
108  maxTranslationLimit(initMaxTranslationLimit), motorSpeed(0),
109  maxMotorForce(0) {}
110 
112 
122  SliderJointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2,
123  const Vector3& initAnchorPointWorldSpace,
124  const Vector3& initSliderAxisWorldSpace,
125  decimal initMinTranslationLimit, decimal initMaxTranslationLimit,
126  decimal initMotorSpeed, decimal initMaxMotorForce)
127  : JointInfo(rigidBody1, rigidBody2, JointType::SLIDERJOINT),
128  anchorPointWorldSpace(initAnchorPointWorldSpace),
129  sliderAxisWorldSpace(initSliderAxisWorldSpace),
130  isLimitEnabled(true), isMotorEnabled(true),
131  minTranslationLimit(initMinTranslationLimit),
132  maxTranslationLimit(initMaxTranslationLimit), motorSpeed(initMotorSpeed),
133  maxMotorForce(initMaxMotorForce) {}
134 };

349 // Return true if the limits or the joint are enabled
353 inline bool SliderJoint::isLimitEnabled() const {
354  return mIsLimitEnabled;
355 }
356 
357 // Return true if the motor of the joint is enabled
361 inline bool SliderJoint::isMotorEnabled() const {
362  return mIsMotorEnabled;
363 }
364 
365 // Return the minimum translation limit
369 inline decimal SliderJoint::getMinTranslationLimit() const {
370  return mLowerLimit;
371 }
372 
373 // Return the maximum translation limit
377 inline decimal SliderJoint::getMaxTranslationLimit() const {
378  return mUpperLimit;
379 }
380 
381 // Return the motor speed
385 inline decimal SliderJoint::getMotorSpeed() const {
386  return mMotorSpeed;
387 }
388 
389 // Return the maximum motor force
393 inline decimal SliderJoint::getMaxMotorForce() const {
394  return mMaxMotorForce;
395 }
396 
397 // Return the intensity of the current force applied for the joint motor
402 inline decimal SliderJoint::getMotorForce(decimal timeStep) const {
403  return mImpulseMotor / timeStep;
404 }
405 
406 // Return the number of bytes used by the joint
407 inline size_t SliderJoint::getSizeInBytes() const {
408  return sizeof(SliderJoint);
409 }
410 
411 // Return a string representation
412 inline std::string SliderJoint::to_string() const {
413  return "SliderJoint{ lowerLimit=" + std::to_string(mLowerLimit) + ", upperLimit=" + std::to_string(mUpperLimit) +
414  "localAnchorPointBody1=" + mLocalAnchorPointBody1.to_string() + ", localAnchorPointBody2=" +
415  mLocalAnchorPointBody2.to_string() + ", sliderAxisBody1=" + mSliderAxisBody1.to_string() +
416  ", initOrientationDifferenceInv=" +
417  mInitOrientationDifferenceInv.to_string() + ", motorSpeed=" + std::to_string(mMotorSpeed) +
418  ", maxMotorForce=" + std::to_string(mMaxMotorForce) + ", isLimitEnabled=" +
419  (mIsLimitEnabled ? "true" : "false") + ", isMotorEnabled=" + (mIsMotorEnabled ? "true" : "false") + "}";
420 }
421 
422 }
423
